TopicTitle: Weekly challenge 5: my first YouTube video

Articles.Content:
Hi

I've been playing KSP for years, but this is the first time I make a YouTube video, usually I'm just proud and happy enough when I complete a challenge and I never show it to anyone.

Anyway, I know my piloting was far from perfect and the video is a bit dark but here it is, just tell me what you think about it.

 

Thanks !
